(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP 've)
      (ADVP (RB always))
      (VP (VBN maintained)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ only) (NN thing))
              (VP
                (ADVP (RBR better))
                (ADVP (RB then))
                (VBG finding)
                (ADVP (RB really))
                (NP (JJ good) (NN food))))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (VP (VBG finding)
                (NP
                  (ADJP (RB really) (JJ good))
                  (NN food))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP
                    (ADJP (RB really) (JJ good))
                    (NNS prices)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(maintained-4, I-1)
aux(maintained-4, 've-2)
advmod(maintained-4, always-3)
root(ROOT-0, maintained-4)
mark(finding-16, that-5)
det(thing-8, the-6)
amod(thing-8, only-7)
nsubj(finding-16, thing-8)
advmod(finding-11, better-9)
advmod(finding-11, then-10)
partmod(thing-8, finding-11)
advmod(finding-11, really-12)
amod(food-14, good-13)
dobj(finding-11, food-14)
aux(finding-16, is-15)
ccomp(maintained-4, finding-16)
advmod(good-18, really-17)
amod(food-19, good-18)
dobj(finding-16, food-19)
prep(finding-16, at-20)
advmod(good-22, really-21)
amod(prices-23, good-22)
pobj(at-20, prices-23)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Pao) (NNP Today))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (ADVP (RB only) (RB just))
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBN opened)
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN couple))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNS months))))))))
      (CC but)
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADVP (RB already))
        (VP (VBG attracting)
          (NP (DT a) (JJ big) (NN following))
          (PP (IN with)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ their) (NN stall))
              (PP (IN at)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP World) (NNP Food) (NNP Fair))))))))
    (. .)))

            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN quality))
              (PP (IN of)

        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
